/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. Cars are parked along the side of the street, adding a touch of urban life to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
